snippet: While American politicians refuse to enact gun control laws, American gun enthusiasts are buying up Russian-made Kalashnikov rifles and shotguns by the tens of thousands.
abstract: Editorial lambastes American politicians for refusing to enact gun control laws, despite recent massacre in Aurora, Colo; decries the fact that American gun enthusiasts buying up Kalashnikov rifles by the tens of thousands are keeping Russian gun-maker in business, as even Russia has stricter gun laws than the US.
lead_paragraph: While American politicians refuse to enact gun control laws, American gun enthusiasts are buying up Russian-made Kalashnikov rifles and shotguns by the tens of thousands.

headline.seo: That Hot New Rifle From Russia
headline.main: That Hot New Rifle From Russia
headline.print_headline: That Hot New Rifle From Russia
